forgetPassword.sendMessage: Don't worry, please enter your mobile number and we'll send you a verification code via SMS.

forgetPasswordVerify.notRecive: Didn't receive the code? Resend after 50 seconds

mobileVerify.sendOTP: OTP code has been sent to Email
mobileVerify.notRecive: Did not receive a code? Resend after 50 seconds

newPassword.shouldNew: The new password must be different from the previous one.

RegisterScreen.fillInFields: Fill in the following fields and create an account

requiredScreen.mustLogin: You must sign in to access our full website

signupDone.accountCreated: Your account has been successfully created
signupDone.canBrowse: You can now browse the website and discover all the places in Jordan.

contactUsScreen.haveQuestions: Do you have any questions or feedback? Just contact us!

privacyScreen.privacyPolicyApplies: This privacy policy applies to all personal data you provide to us through the website. This policy is developed to enhance your confidence in the privacy and security of your personal information.
privacyScreen.whenEnteringUserData: By entering your user information, you agree that we may retain your user information, either by us or by a third-party service provider processing this information on our behalf. We may use your user information for the following purposes:
privacyScreen.weMayUseYourUserData: - Communicating with you through any means (including email, phone, text messages, and social media) to notify you of news and other information of interest, subject to ensuring that such notifications comply with the law; maintaining and updating your contact information as needed; obtaining your prior voluntary consent as required.
privacyScreen.sendPeriodicCorrespondence: - Sending periodic correspondences to you (including email messages) regarding specifications, products, services, events, and special offers.
privacyScreen.youCanNotifyUs: You can inform us of any updates, modifications, or corrections you make to user information that we have previously collected through the 'Contact Us' form.

singlePartner.ifYouWantToVisit: If you want to visit the most peaceful and charming tourist places in Jordan, just visit
singlePartner.pleaseLogin: Please sign in or create an account to access all details and contact methods.
